releaseDescription: Stefan Mahendra's debut single. A heartfelt and honest love record that manages to feel uniquely vintage and surprisingly modern at the same time. Having been performing for years (you may have seen him as a quarter-finalist on the Voice UK 2019) and only now coming into the nascent stage of his creative and artistic development, Mahendra displays unmistakable and impressive potential in his debut single. 'Lovinâ€™ You Is Easy' is a masterful exhibit of modern R&B, harkening back to the era of soul and jazz music.
